channel.title: Data Visualization on Hailey Gryka
channel.description: Recent content in Data Visualization on Hailey Gryka

item.title: Plotting London Boroughs
item.description: Introduction This Rmarkdown document shows the use of both R and Python for analyzing the London Boroughs dataset. The reticulate library allows us to use Python code in an R environment. This code has been adapted from code by Dhiraj Khanna. Load Libraries library(tidyverse) library(reticulate) #To work with python library(lubridate) #To deal with date fields library(shiny) library(scales) theme_set(theme_light()) Data Ingestion Python script is used to read in the data.
